name: cis4500
description: A web app that generates a custom Spotify playlist based on the weather for some location. By default, a user would probably input their own, but the application will allow inputting different areas as well. The user may also adjust for other factors such as the date and overall playlist features like liveliness, tempo, or loudness of the songs.

scripts.build: (cd client && npm run build) && (cd server && npm install)
